reviews.subject: Physics
reviews.review: Great teacher, explains concepts well but can be a bit strict on grading.

reviews.subject: Mathematics
reviews.review: Amazing professor! Very approachable and makes complex topics easy to understand.

reviews.subject: Computer Science
reviews.review: Lectures are informative but tend to be dry. Assignments are challenging.

reviews.subject: History
reviews.review: Not very engaging. Lectures can be boring and exams are tough.

reviews.subject: Biology
reviews.review: Excellent teacher with a deep understanding of the subject. Highly recommended!

reviews.subject: Chemistry
reviews.review: The material is challenging, and the professor's explanations could be clearer.

reviews.subject: English
reviews.review: Great lecturer with insightful discussions. However, the reading load is heavy.

reviews.subject: Economics
reviews.review: Very engaging and knowledgeable. Makes economics interesting.

reviews.subject: Psychology
reviews.review: Engaging lectures, but exams can be difficult.

reviews.subject: Sociology
reviews.review: Average teaching style. Could use more interactive methods.

reviews.subject: Philosophy
reviews.review: Incredible professor. Deep thinker and excellent at explaining complex ideas.

reviews.subject: Political Science
reviews.review: Very knowledgeable and encourages class participation.

reviews.subject: Art History
reviews.review: Interesting subject matter, but the lectures can be monotonous.

reviews.subject: Anthropology
reviews.review: Engaging and passionate about the subject. Highly recommend!

reviews.subject: Geography
reviews.review: Not very clear in her explanations. Class material is difficult to follow.

reviews.subject: Statistics
reviews.review: Solid professor with good examples, but the pace can be fast.

reviews.subject: Linguistics
reviews.review: Exceptional professor with a great teaching style. Makes learning fun.

reviews.subject: Environmental Science
reviews.review: The content is interesting, but the lectures are somewhat dry.

reviews.subject: Astronomy
reviews.review: Fascinating subject and the professor is very passionate about it.

reviews.subject: Classical Studies
reviews.review: Excellent professor. Makes ancient history come alive in his lectures.
